description: This file defines the database schema for the TurfRun game, including tables for users and zones, enums, helper functions for spatial grid calculations, and triggers for timestamp updates.

methods.name: generate_grid_id
methods.description: Generates a grid identifier based on latitude and longitude by snapping to a 50m grid size.

methods.name: generate_zone_geom
methods.description: Creates a 50m x 50m polygon geometry for a zone at given latitude and longitude, snapping to the grid.

methods.name: get_zone_id_at_location
methods.description: Returns the zone grid ID corresponding to specific latitude and longitude coordinates.
